char* getInput (  const char *  modelName,
int  index = 0,
const char *  inputType = 0
) 
 

using modelName, inputType, and index, get the name of an input model of type inputType at index.

if index is invalid, or does not contain a position of an input source, or the type of the source model does not match inputType, or some other error occurs, a blank string will be returned. DO NOT delete the return string, it will be destroyed automatically when program terminates.

a default index of 0 returns the first index (first model connected). a default inputType of 0 will return any model's name regardless of it's type.
